item.title: Toyota announces $792m expansion of Czech plant to build new electric car
item.description: Toyota plans to invest 680 million euros ($792 million) in a new production line at its plant in Czech Republic to build electric cars

item.title: European shares rise after Asian benchmarks finish mostly lower
item.description: Asian shares are mostly declining, with cautious trading on the Tokyo Stock Exchange amid political uncertainty
